channel.title: Looking for a keyboard (synth/midi control)
channel.description:
Not sure how many of you are musicians, but I'm looking for a keyboard. Here are the things I'm looking for:
* Midi control (USB in addition to midi output would be nice) * Included synths * Realistically weighted key action * 49 key minimum * $700 or less, preferably * Studio and stage use
I've been doing lots of searching and a lot of the boards that strike my interest seem to be out of production. If any of you use a board you really enjoy that even kind of fits the bill, let me know.

item.title: Looking for a keyboard (synth/midi control)
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
Not sure how many of you are musicians, but I’m looking for a keyboard. Here are the things I’m looking for:

  • Midi control (USB in addition to midi output would be nice)
  • Included synths
  • Realistically weighted key action
  • 49 key minimum
  • $700 or less, preferably
  • Studio and stage use

I’ve been doing lots of searching and a lot of the boards that strike my interest seem to be out of production. If any of you use a board you really enjoy that even kind of fits the bill, let me know.
